DataElement.preferredName: OARS Multidimensional Functional Assessment IADL Questionnaire Take Your Medicines Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's response to a question about their ability to take their own medicines.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: OARS Multidimensional Functional Assessment IADL Questionnaire Take Your Medicines
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services._A section of the Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire (OMFAQ) that seeks information about a person's functional ability to conduct the complex activities of daily living that allow for independent living within a community._A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services.

Concepts.longName: Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services.

Property.preferredName: Instrumental Activities of Daily Living Take Your Medicines
Property.preferredDefinition: A section of the Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire (OMFAQ) that seeks information about a person's functional ability to conduct the complex activities of daily living that allow for independent living within a community.:A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

Concepts.definition: A section of the Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire (OMFAQ) that seeks information about a person's functional ability to conduct the complex activities of daily living that allow for independent living within a community.
A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: are you completely unable to take your medicines?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: are you completely unable to take your medicines?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is completely unable to do something.: A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is completely unable to do something.
A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: with some help (able to take medicine if someone prepares it for you and/or reminds you to take it)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: with some help (able to take medicine if someone prepares it for you and/or reminds you to take it)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something only with assistance.: A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something only with assistance.
A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: without help (in the right doses at the right time)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: without help (in the right doses at the right time)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something without assistance.: A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something without assistance.
A question about whether an individual is able to take their medicine.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that no answer was given.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that no answer was given.
